title: FPS drops with new patch
body: Ever since the new patch, me & my friends all get insane FPS drops at the same time. While it's only for a second, it can cause a lot as the delay can cause deaths & lost team fights. My friend says "That split second is game changing, not being able to press E on Garen is a second of not spinning" Please look into it. Thanks!

replies.body: FPS drops shouldn't necessarily impact your ability to use champion skills, so this almost sounds like you might be experiencing some packet loss. Let's run a quick test for that first using our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Grab your recent network logs from a game that had those FPS spikes, let that reader scan it, and post a screenshot here so I can go over it with you!

Well... it can when you're in the middle of a fight, the FPS drops throw you off & you die from it.

I can guarantee it's not packet loss, at least on my end. My friend was the one having issues with his Champion abilites during that split FPS drop. I don't think I can send his logs. :/
